tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE TreatmentMethods ( treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, treatment_name STRING, success_rate FLOAT, cost DECIMAL(10,2) )

CREATE TABLE patient_results (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    method_id INT NOT NULL,
    result VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES treatment_methods(method_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  treatment_method_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (treatment_method_id) REFERENCES treatment_methods(method_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_treatments (
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  treatment_id INT REFERENCES treatment_methods(id),
  condition_id INT REFERENCES conditions(condition_id),
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(50)
);
